outputs.name: update
outputs.label: Update
outputs.description: The complete Telegram update object containing update_id and message

outputs.name: message
outputs.label: Message
outputs.description: The incoming Telegram message object containing message_id, text, date, from, and chat fields

outputs.name: chat_id
outputs.label: Chat ID
outputs.description: The chat ID where the message was sent (extracted from message.chat.id)

outputs.name: text
outputs.label: Message Text
outputs.description: The text content of the message (extracted from message.text)

outputs.name: from_user
outputs.label: From User
outputs.description: Information about the user who sent the message (extracted from message.from), containing id, is_bot, first_name, and language_code

outputs.name: chat
outputs.label: Chat
outputs.description: Information about the chat where the message was sent (extracted from message.chat), containing id, first_name, type (private/group/channel)

outputs.name: date
outputs.label: Date
outputs.description: Unix timestamp of when the message was sent (extracted from message.date)
